Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Class PagesReleaseManagerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.service.PagesReleaseManagerPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.composum.sling.platform.staging.StagingReleaseManagerPlugin
    public class PagesReleaseManagerPlugin
extends Object
implements com.composum.sling.platform.staging.StagingReleaseManagerPlugin
    Fixes the Release Worktree for inconsistencies due to deactivated pages. In that case, there is a cpp:Page in the worktree that has a deactivated (and thus in the release invisible) cpp:PageContent, which violates the constraint that a cpp:Page has a mandatory cpp:PageContent. We take two measures to fix this:
    1. cpp:Page without any active children are set to StagingConstants.PROP_DEACTIVATED=true to hide them.
    2. If a cpp:Page has active children, but a deactivated cpp:PageContent, we set it's JcrConstants.JCR_PRIMARYTYPE to CoreConstants.TYPE_SLING_ORDERED_FOLDER.

      • fixupReleaseForChanges

        public void fixupReleaseForChanges​(@Nonnull
                                   com.composum.sling.platform.staging.Release release,
                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource workspaceCopyNode,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   Set<String> changedPaths,
                                   com.composum.sling.platform.staging.ReleaseChangeEvent event)
                            throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Traverse all parents of the changed paths and check whether they need to be fixed. The ReleaseManager made them attribute-wise equal to the workspace, but we might set them to StagingConstants.PROP_DEACTIVATED or change the resource type to CoreConstants.TYPE_SLING_ORDERED_FOLDER.
        Specified by:
        fixupReleaseForChanges in interface com.composum.sling.platform.staging.StagingReleaseManagerPlugin
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
